classitems.description:
Y.View's events static property, where we define a "click" listener on Nodes in the
container that are the MenuItem nodes.                    *
classitems.name: events

classitems.description: Default HTML template for the container's content         *
classitems.name: template

classitems.description: A placeholder to hold subscriber EventHandles so they can be destroyed properly
classitems.name: _subscr

classitems.description: Sets an increment that the Overlay box will be positioned relative to the e.target "x-coordinate"
classitems.name: _overlayDX

classitems.description: Sets an increment that the Overlay box will be positioned relative to the e.target "y-coordinate"
classitems.name: _overlayDY

classitems.description: Initializer where we define initial handlers to invoke this view and to hide the Overlay
classitems.name: initializer

classitems.description: Clean up listeners and destroys the Overlay
classitems.name: destructor

classitems.description: Method that hides the Overlay for this contextmenu and fires the `contextMenuHide` event
classitems.name: hideOverlay

classitems.description: Default value setter for attribute `overlay`, creates a Y.Overlay widget to display the menu within
classitems.name: _valOverlay

params.name: e
params.description: Y.Event target object created when "context" menu fires

classitems.description: Process a "click" event on the Content Menu's Overlay menuItems
Helper method to clear DOM "selected" text or ranges
classitems.name: _clearDOMSelection

classitems.description: Fired after the "contextmenu" event is initiated and the Menu has been positioned and displayed
classitems.name: contextMenuShow

classitems.description: Fired after a Menu choice has been selected from the ContexMenu and the menu has been hidden
classitems.name: contextMenuHide

classitems.description: Container Node where the menu's Overlay will be rendered into
classitems.name: container

classitems.description: Defines the container element for the "contextmenu" event listener to attach this menu to.
classitems.name: trigger
classitems.type: {String} trigger.target Container filter selector to assign target from container event

classitems.description:
Set to the returned target within the `trigger.node` container that the "contextmenu" event was initiated on
(e.g. for a DataTable this may be a specific TR row within the table body).

This is not intended to be .set by the user, but is meant to be read by users.
classitems.name: contextTarget

classitems.description:
Overrideable HTML template to use for creating each `menuItem` entry in Overlay.
Must include "data-cmenu"
classitems.name: menuItemTemplate

classitems.description:
Array of "menu" item {Objects} to add to the Menu.  Each item is an object, including the following;
  content, dataValue
classitems.name: menuItems

classitems.description: Y.Overlay instance used to render the pop-up context menu within
classitems.name: overlay

classitems.description:
Set to the "selected" item from the pop-up Overlay menu when clicked by user, where this
attribute is set to an object containing the EventTarget of the selection and the resulting
menuitem that that corresponds to.

This is not intended to be .set by the user, but is meant to be read by users.
classitems.name: selectedMenu

params.name: obj.evt
params.description: Event target from "click" selection within displayed Overlay

params.name: obj.menuItem
params.description: Menuitem object entry selected from `menuItems` array
